> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel Paul Hightower [mailto:dph_of_rules@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 15, 2001 11:27 PM
> To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [gladiator] Re: Wish List Part 2
>
> Orc Captain - ok, how about giving him the power to walk on water.
> Also, give him the proposed "throw net' attack which paralyzes an
> enemy.  Another attack for him would be 'Poison dart'.  Once you get
> him, you keep losing so many health points constantly until the
> character dies or you finish the scenario.

Yes, I like the idea of DoT (Damage over Time) attacks as well. Also, we
should concentrate on attacks that really differ the Orc, and orc captian,
and the Mage, and Archmage, plus add extra promotions ot other characters,
Such as High Priest (Upgrade from a cleric), or a Necromancer (Upgrade from
a skeleton)

This is another message sent by the infamous Ricky Der, The Legendary Light.
